cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0)

# project name and version
project(avalanche VERSION 0.1.0)

# set the debug flag, to be removed with final releases
set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Debug)

# add source files then put them into the source variable
file(GLOB SOURCE ./src/*.cpp)

# add the executable
add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} ${SOURCE})

# add include/
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "../SFML/include" "./include")

# add libraries
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} sfml-graphics sfml-window sfml-system)

# autogenerated
include(CTest)
enable_testing()
set(CPACK_PROJECT_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
set(CPACK_PROJECT_VERSION ${PROJECT_VERSION})
include(CPack)
